A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I know that this film has split the Star Wars community and fandom almost straight down the middle\, but I fall into the group who loved it. I still felt like I was watching a Star Wars film\, but it's approach was unique\, and the questions that it posed were thought provoking. I'm giving it 5 full Stars\, and it's moved into my #2 spot in the Star Wars Saga\, right behind the 'Empire Strikes Back'.
